DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind placebo-controlled randomized clinical trial evaluate whether Chinese medicine formula ( Qing ' E , compose eucommia , psoralen , walnuts garlic ) effective alleviate menopausal symptom . 240 Chinese woman menopausal symptom recruit randomized two group . One treatment group 12 week Qing ' E pill ( well-controlled ) , control group 12 week placebo . The treatment outcome measure include : 1 ) severity menopausal symptom : self-recording daily frequency vasomotor symptom ( hot flush ) , Kupperman index . 2 ) NEI network index . 3 ) Urine metabolomics . All measure conduct baseline endpoint except self-recoding vasomotor symptom , Kupperman index urine metabolomics . Tyhe investigator expect research provide effective safe therapy menopausal symptom .
